author: poetryin motion
text: Next year I am sending more cards and flowers. Personal notes handwritten words.

author: poetryin motion
text: Why do people believe it is ok to say unkind things to others? What is is about society that makes them think being unpleasant is “real” Kindness isn’t a weakness and nastiness isn’t a strength.

author: poetryin motion
text: Wishing a happy birthday to one who I can not seem to forget nor forgive. May one day you turn and see the destruction you created and yet still have the courage to turn back and see. ❤️ and hope

author: poetryin motion
text: I don’t understand the I am a bitch and proud of it people. When did being unkind suddenly be a sign of strength? It isn’t strong to be nasty to call people names it is weak. Strong powerful people have no need to make others feel small

author: poetryin motion
text: I let go of a connection today, it was a confusing one but I am sad he couldn’t hear what I was saying instead name assumptions based upon passed failings. So I let go

author: poetryin motion
text: So I have decided that if you treat me like a cat I am happy, lots of touching and pats, attention when u want it and leave me alone 60% of the time.

author: poetryin motion
text: The problem with relationships is that in order for society to deem it successful you or your loved one has to die. Why is it that a relationship that lasts ten years and then stops is called a failure? Maybe that was how long the relationship was supposed to last.

author: poetryin motion
text: Drop a 🥑and I will write something about you. 🌟

author: poetryin motion
text: The leaves are turning now summer is gone, yet I can still smtaste the salt of the sea in my lips and feel your warm hand in mine

author: poetryin motion
text: Your darkness consumed everything, till I was left in the dark alone, yet a spark inside allowed a tiny glow to form, watch it as it roars to life.
